rukus.text: Yiqie zansong, quan guizhenzhu! Tiandi wanwu, dou shi ta de. Houshi de zansong, zhi guiyu ta. Ta shi zhi rui de, shi che zhi de.
Ta zhidao qianru dixia de, cong dixia fachu de, cong tianshang jiangxia de, sheng dao tianshang de. Ta shi zhi ci de, shi zhi she de.

Bu xindao de renmen shuo: Fuhuo shi bu hui lailin women. Ni shuo: Buran. Zhi wo de zhu fashi, ta bi lailin nimen. Wo de zhu shi quanzhi youxuan de, tiandi jian wei chen zhong de zhong wu, buneng yuanli ta; bi na geng xiao de, he geng da de, wu yi jian bu jilu zai yi ben mingbai de jingdian zhong.
Yibian ta zai fuhuo shi baochou xindao er xingshan de renmen. Zhe deng ren, jiang huo she youhe youhou de jiyang.
Jieli fandui wo de jixiang yiwei yijing chenggong de ren, jiang shou tongku de xingfa.
You xueshi de renmen, zhidao cong ni de zhu jiang shi ni de jingdian, que shi zhenli, neng zhishi (shiren zou shang) wanneng de, ke song de zhu de dadao.
Bu xindao de renmen shuo: Women zhishi nimen yige ren hao ma? Ta hui gaosu nimen, dang nimen bei fensui zhihou, nimen biding yao bei zaizao.
Ta jiajie zhen zhu de mingyi er niezao ne? Haishi ta you feng bing? Buran! Bu xin houshi de renmen shi zai xingfa he shen shen de mi wu zhong.

Nandao tamen meiyou guancha zai tamen shangmian he xiamian de tiandi ma? Ruguo wo yiyu, wo bi shi tamen lunxian zai dimian xia, huo shi tian yikuai yikuai di luo zai tamen de tou shang. Duiyu mei yige guiyi de puren, ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang.
